name: veedemus
tag_list: movie-collection, social, sharing, dvd, movie, film
overview:
veedemus is a new web app that lets you track and organize your movie collection online.

You can add movies, organize them by tags, mark when you last time watched them so you can see what movies you watch most often and which movie you havenâ€™t watched in a long time, mark items that you have lent to people, and share your collections with other users.

There is no registration, the application works with your Google account. To add movies to your collection simply search for a movie by title. If youâ€™ve found the movie youâ€™re looking for, click the green icon and the movie will be added. Once you have your collection online, you can access it from anywhere, browse it alphabetically and sort movies by title, year, length, recently added and recently watched.
